title: Biosample
comment: For cultured samples this object represents unique growths or culture harvests.

phase.comment: The phase property is restricted to biosamples with biosample_type that belongs to [primary cell, immortalized cell line, in vitro differentiated cells, induced pluripotent stem cell line, stem cell].

post_synchronization_time_units.comment: Biosample with a specified post_synchronization_units requires post_synchronization_time specification and specification of the model organism synchronization stage.

post_treatment_time.comment: Biosample with a specified post_treatment_time requires non-empty treatments list and post_treatment_time_units specification.

post_treatment_time_units.comment: Biosample with a specified post_treatment_time_units requires requires non-empty treatments list post_treatment_time specification.

pooled_from.comment: Biosample with a specified pooled_from list requires at least two entries in the list.

culture_harvest_date.comment: The culture_harvest_date property is restricted to biosamples with biosample_type that belongs to [primary cell, immortalized cell line, in vitro differentiated cells, induced pluripotent stem cell line, stem cell].

culture_start_date.comment: The culture_start_date property is restricted to biosamples with biosample_type that belongs to [primary cell, immortalized cell line, in vitro differentiated cells, induced pluripotent stem cell line, stem cell].

starting_amount.comment: Biosample with a specified starting_amount requires starting_amount_units specification.

starting_amount_units.comment: Biosample with a specified starting_amount_units requires starting_amount specification.

model_organism_age_units.comment: Biosample with a specified model_organism_age_units requires model_organism_age specification.

depleted_in_term_name.comment: Only biosamples with biosample_type whole organisms or tissue are allowed to have depleted_in_term_name property.

model_organism_age.comment: Biosample with a specified model_organism_age requires model_organism_age_units specification.

model_organism_mating_status.comment: Biosample with a specified model_organism_mating_status requires model_organism_sex specification.

organism.comment: Human biosamples are not allowed to have model organism properties, and biosample_type should be different from whole organisms.

post_synchronization_time.comment: Human and mouse biosamples are not allowed to have post_synchronization_time property. Biosample with a specified post_synchronization_time requires post_synchronization_time_units specification and model organism synchronization stage.

fly_life_stage.comment: Only fly biosamples are allowed to have fly_life_stage property.

fly_synchronization_stage.comment: Only fly biosamples are allowed to have fly_synchronization_stage property.

worm_synchronization_stage.comment: Only roundworm biosamples are allowed to have worm_synchronization_stage property.

worm_life_stage.comment: Only roundworm biosamples are allowed to have worm_life_stage property.

mouse_life_stage.comment: Only mouse biosamples are allowed to have mouse_life_stage property.

alternate_accessions.title: Alternate accessions
alternate_accessions.description: Accessions previously assigned to objects that have been merged with this object.
alternate_accessions.comment: Do not submit. Only admins are allowed to set or update this value.

items.title: Alternate Accession
items.description: An accession previously assigned to an object that has been merged with this object.
items.comment: Only accessions of objects that have status equal replaced will work here.

description.title: Description
description.description: A plain text description of the biosample. Do not include experiment details, genetic modifications or treatments.
description.comment: Free text description of the biosample, do not mix with biosample summary that is calculated and controlled.

elasticsearch_mapping_index_type.title: Field mapping index type
elasticsearch_mapping_index_type.description: Defines one of three types of indexing available

treatments.title: Treatments
treatments.description: A list of treatments applied to the biosample.
treatments.comment: A list of treatments applied to the biosample, it is required to be non-empty if post_treatment_time or post_treatment_time_units are specified.

dbxrefs.title: External identifiers
dbxrefs.description: Biosample identifiers from external resources, such as Biosample database or Cellosaurus.
dbxrefs.comment: Do not submit. DCC personnel is responsible for submission of biosample external resource identifiers.

documents.description: Documents that describe the biosample preparation.

donor.title: Donor
donor.description: The donor or strain the biosample was originated from.
donor.comment: For human biosamples, see human_donor.json for available identifiers. For mouse biosamples, see mouse_donor.json for available identifiers. For worm biosamples, see worm_donor.json for available identifiers. For fly biosamples, see fly_donor.json for available identifiers.

organism.title: Organism
organism.description: The organism the biosample was originated from.

passage_number.title: Passage number
passage_number.description: Number of passages including the passages from the source.
passage_number.comment: In calculating passage number, include passages from the source.

depleted_in_term_name.title: Depleted in term
depleted_in_term_name.description: UBERON (Uber Anatomy Ontology) term best matching the tissue(s)/body part(s) that were removed from the biosample.

model_organism_mating_status.title: Mating status
model_organism_mating_status.description: The mating status of the animal.
model_organism_mating_status.comment: The value is not available for human biosamples.

internal_tags.title: Internal tags
internal_tags.description: Some biosamples are part of particular data collections.
internal_tags.comment: Do not submit. Internal tags are for DCC use only.

originated_from.title: Originated from
originated_from.description: A biosample that the sample was orginated from.

pooled_from.title: Pooled from
pooled_from.description: The biosamples from which aliquots were pooled to form the biosample.
pooled_from.comment: A list of biosamples used to create the biosample, if specified, it requires minimum of two entries.

items.description: A biosample from which an aliquot was taken to form the biosample.

part_of.title: Separated from
part_of.description: A biosample from which a discrete component was taken. That component is this biosample.

host.title: Host biosample
host.description: A biosample that was hosting this biosample.
host.comment: For example a mouse could be a host of bone marrow biosample in case of transplantation. See biosamples.json for available identifiers.

subcellular_fraction_term_name.title: Subcellular fraction name
subcellular_fraction_term_name.description: The GO (Gene Ontology) term name for cellular component that constitutes the biosample.

phase.title: Cell-cycle phase
phase.description: Specification of cell cycle phase of the biosample.
phase.comment: The phase property is restricted to biosamples with biosample_type that belongs to [primary cell, immortalized cell line, in vitro differentiated cells, induced pluripotent stem cell line, stem cell].

culture_harvest_date.title: Culture harvest date
culture_harvest_date.description: For cultured samples, the date the biosample was taken.
culture_harvest_date.comment: Date should be submitted in as YYYY-MM-DD. The property is limited to biosamples with biosample_type that belongs to [primary cell, immortalized cell line, in vitro differentiated cells, induced pluripotent stem cell line, stem cell].

culture_start_date.title: Culture start date
culture_start_date.description: For cultured samples, the date the culture was started. For cell lines, the date this particular growth was started, not the date the line was established.
culture_start_date.comment: Date should be submitted in as YYYY-MM-DD. The property is limited to biosamples with biosample_type that belongs to [primary cell, immortalized cell line, in vitro differentiated cells, induced pluripotent stem cell line, stem cell].

date_obtained.title: Date obtained
date_obtained.description: For tissue samples, the date the biosample was taken.
date_obtained.comment: Date should be submitted in as YYYY-MM-DD.

starting_amount.title: Starting amount
starting_amount.description: The initial quantity of cells, tissue or animals obtained.

starting_amount_units.title: Starting amount units
starting_amount_units.description: The units used to quantify the amount of cells or tissue obtained.

model_organism_sex.title: Model organism sex
model_organism_sex.description: The sex of the organism the biosample comes from.
model_organism_sex.comment: model_organism_sex is not valid for a human biosample.

mouse_life_stage.title: Mouse life stage
mouse_life_stage.description: The life stage of the mouse biosample.
mouse_life_stage.comment: mouse_life_stage is not valid for a human biosample.

fly_life_stage.title: Fly life stage
fly_life_stage.description: Fly development stage of the animals used to prepare the biosample.
fly_life_stage.comment: fly_life_stage is valid only for fly biosamples.

fly_synchronization_stage.title: Fly synchronization stage
fly_synchronization_stage.description: Fly development stage at which flies were synchronized.
fly_synchronization_stage.comment: Stage at which flies were synchronized. If available use in conjunction with time and time units post-synchronization.
enum: puff stage: PS (1-2), dark blue gut
puff stage: PS (3-6), light blue gut

post_synchronization_time.title: Post-synchronization time
post_synchronization_time.description: The time that elapsed past the point when animals were synchronized.
post_synchronization_time.comment: Use in conjunction with fly_synchronization_stage or worm_synchronization_stage to specify time elapsed post-synchronization. It requires specification of post_synchronization_time_units as well.

post_synchronization_time_units.title: Post-synchronization time units
post_synchronization_time_units.description: The units of time that elapsed past the point when animals were synchronized.
post_synchronization_time_units.comment: Use in conjunction with fly_synchronization_stage or worm_synchronization_stage and post_synchronization_time to specify time elapsed post-synchronization.

post_treatment_time.title: Post-treatment time
post_treatment_time.description: The time that elapsed past the point when biosamples were treated.
post_treatment_time.comment: Use in conjunction with treatment and post_treatment_time_units to specify time elapsed post-treatment. post_treatment_time specification requires non-empty treatments list and post_treatment_time_units specification.

post_treatment_time_units.title: Post-treatment time units
post_treatment_time_units.description: The units of time that elapsed past the point when biosamples were treated.
post_treatment_time_units.comment: Use in conjunction with post_treatment_time and treatment to specify time elapsed post-treatment. post_treatment_time_units specification requires non-empty treatments list and post_treatment_time specification.

worm_life_stage.title: Worm life stage
worm_life_stage.description: Worm development stage of the animals used to prepare the biosample.
worm_life_stage.comment: worm_life_stage is valid only for worm biosamples.
enum: mixed stage (late embryonic and L1 larva)

worm_synchronization_stage.title: Worm synchronization stage
worm_synchronization_stage.description: Worm development stage at which the animals were synchronized.
worm_synchronization_stage.comment: Stage at which worms were synchronized. Use in conjunction with time and time units post-synchronization.  worm_life_stage is valid only for worm biosamples.

model_organism_age.title: Model organism donor age
model_organism_age.description: The age or age range of the model donor organism when biological material was sampled.
model_organism_age.comment: model_organism_age is not valid for a human biosample.

model_organism_age_units.title: Model organism donor age units
model_organism_age_units.description: Age units of the model organism.
model_organism_age_units.comment: model_organism_age_units are not valid for a human biosample.

model_organism_health_status.title: Model organism donor health status
model_organism_health_status.description: Health status of the model organism.
model_organism_health_status.comment: model_organism_health_status is not valid for a human biosample.
